articles.title: Shrewd signings, a smart manager and the force of the fans - it's time to take Newcastle seriously - Daily Mail
articles.description: Hurst, 34, may be too young to have fully appreciated that buzz of the 1990s, but Lee felt it first hand. He joined Newcastle in September 1992, seven months after Keegan took charge.

articles.title: Emma Raducanu withdraws from GB's Billie Jean King Cup squad in bruising end to a difficult season - Daily Mail
articles.description: MIKE DICKSON: In a considerable blow for the event, the British number one revealed that the wrist injury which stopped her competing in Romania earlier this month has yet to heal sufficiently.
articles.content:
The last embers of Emma Raducanu's season were extinguished on Friday night when she was forced to withdraw from the GB squad contesting next month's Billie Jean King Cup finals week in Glasgow.
